anto is a noun meaning "mouth" in Quenya: Image:Anto.gifAnto is also the name in Quenya of the thirteenth letter of the Tengwar alphabet.  It is the first letter of the fourth grade or Tyellë
Note: which contains "voiced spirants" and it is the fourth letter in the dental or t-series of consonants
The names of the letters: the Tincotéma.  In the standard spelling of Quenya Anto represents NT.  In all other modes this letter represents DH (or "voiced" TH).  The Westron name for this letter is Adho.See Westron Tengwar
